root.name: Indoor Soccer for the TI 99/4A
root.description: Indoor Soccer for the TI 99/4A is an old-school, vintage soccer game for the Texas Instruments 99/4A. Screenshot of Indoor Soccer for the TI 99/4AThe game involves two players using their team of sprites to score a goal. Each player can control their sprites via the keyboard or joysticks. The player doesn't usually control one soccer player sprite but instead the entire offense, defense, or the goalkeeper. Players have the option to pass among their soccer player sprites. The player also has the option when beginning the game to determine how the length of the game. Like a real soccer game, the game is divided into two halves. Fouls and penalty kicks do exist in the game.
